name: three-text2d
description: Render texture from canvas into THREE's Mesh or Sprite.
author: Endel Dreyer <endel.dreyer@gmail.com>

scripts.dist: ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/index.js -t babelify -s THREE_Text -o dist/three-text2d.js && ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/index.js -t babelify -t uglifyify -s THREE_Text -o dist/three-text2d.min.js
